title: Japan Stocks Gain to Record as Takaichi Win Fuels Spending Hopes
description: Japanese stocks rallied in Tokyo as Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s historic win in Sunday’s election ignited expectations of more government spending for key industries, including defense and AI.
content: Japanese stocks rallied in Tokyo as Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s historic win in Sunday’s election ignited expectations of more government spending for key industries, including defense and AI.
